Sentencas: The chemistry and microstructure of the interface between calcium substituted lanthanum manganite and cubic calcia stabilized zirconia have been studied.
Titulo: Reactions between La1-xCaxMnO3 and CaO-stabilized ZrO2 -: Part I -: Powder mixtures

Sentencas: The aim was to investigate the chemical stability of these materials as a model system for, respectively, the cathode and the electrolyte in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Reactions between La1-xCaxMnO3 and CaO-stabilized ZrO2 -: Part I -: Powder mixtures

Sentencas: The relative amounts and time dependence of the formation of secondary phases (La2Zr2O7 and CaZrO3) and inter-diffusion between the primary phases were observed to depend on temperature, partial pressure of oxygen, and composition of the manganite.
Titulo: Reactions between La1-xCaxMnO3 and CaO-stabilized ZrO2 -: Part I -: Powder mixtures

Sentencas: 30 mole % Ca on La-site and A-site deficiency of the manganite were shown to stabilize the heterophase interface in air.
Titulo: Reactions between La1-xCaxMnO3 and CaO-stabilized ZrO2 -: Part I -: Powder mixtures

Sentencas: Reducing conditions were shown to destabilize the primary phases and increase the rate of formation of secondary phases.
Titulo: Reactions between La1-xCaxMnO3 and CaO-stabilized ZrO2 -: Part I -: Powder mixtures

Sentencas: Pore-coarsening with increasing amount of Ca in the manganite was the most striking feature in the time dependence of the microstructure.
Titulo: Reactions between La1-xCaxMnO3 and CaO-stabilized ZrO2 -: Part I -: Powder mixtures

Sentencas: The present findings are discussed in relation to the thermodynamic and kinetic stability of the cathode/electrolyte interface of conventional solid oxide fuel cells consisting of yttria stabilized zirconia and strontium substituted lanthanum manganite.
Titulo: Reactions between La1-xCaxMnO3 and CaO-stabilized ZrO2 -: Part I -: Powder mixtures
